column4: Can someone help me get Kiba-Dock setup properly? i kep getting it as a black dock, and all the icons have black over it
if you install it from a .deb try a different one. not all of them work for me either.
kiba-dock_0.1cvs20061018-1_i386.deb is the only one that I have been able to get working in Dapper (never tried edgy)
i tried Pricechilds that he has listed on the forums, everyon in the thread seems to be getting it to work, even after a reinstall it doesnt work .. :( lol
you need composite turned on. check if /etc/X11/xorg.conf contain a Section Extensions with Composite Enabled in it.
